value.title: Add Zoom Sliders on Axis in Power BI Visual
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a need to examine a smaller range of data in a chart without using any additional filters. Zoom sliders will help us a lot in those scenarios. value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files.
